member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Common.WeakEventListener`3
member.summary: Implements a weak event listener that allows the owner to be garbage collected if its only remaining link is an event handler.
member.typeparam: Type of instance listening for the event.
Type of source for the event.
Type of event arguments for the event.

remarks.para:
More info here: http://dlaa.me/blog/post/9468464
The following example demonstrates how to use the weak event listener so that the RadGaugeBase class can track AnimationSettings changes. In the example the RadGaugeBase is 'this' and 'listener'. The AnimationSettings is the 'eventSource' and 'sender'.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Common.WeakEventListener`3.weakListener
member.summary: WeakReference to the instance listening for the event.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WeakEventListener class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the method to call when the event fires.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Common.WeakEventListener`3.OnDetachAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the method to call when detaching from the event.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Common.WeakEventListener`3.OnEvent(System.Object,`2)
member.summary: Handler for the subscribed event calls OnEventAction to handle it.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Common.WeakEventListener`3.Detach
member.summary: Detaches from the subscribed event.
